text: The Alfa Romeo 155 was a car produced by Alfa Romeo. It replaced the 75 in early 1992 and was facelifted in early 1995. It was succeeded by the Alfa Romeo 156 in late 1997. == Engines == === Petrol === * 1.6 Twin Spark 16V 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.7 Twin Spark 85 kW (115 hp) * 1.8 Twin Spark 93 kW (126 hp) * 1.8 Twin Spark 16V 103 kW (140 hp) * 2.0 Twin Spark 104 kW (141 hp) * 2.0 Twin Spark 16V 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 Q4 140 kW (190 hp) * 2.5 V6 121 kW (165 hp) === Diesel === * 2.0 TD 68 kW (92 hp) * 2.5 TD 92 kW (125 hp) == Other websites == 155 Category:1990s automobiles
title: Alfa Romeo 155
